document_data.name: ''Blade of Mastery''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Blade of mastery''''' was a magical weapon that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: This weapon appeared as a small [[jambiya]] with an ethereal blade.
document_data.Powers: The blade of this weapon did not cause any damage. Instead, anyone struck by the blade received a permanent enhancement to one of their main physical or mental abilites.
